DrugInfoMetaData.DrugInfoDescription: This page contains brief information about amivantamab-vmjw and a collection of links to more information about the use of this drug, research results, and ongoing clinical trials.
DrugInfoMetaData.FDAExternalRef: FDA label information for this drug is available at DailyMed.

Para.ExternalRef: FDA label information for this drug is available at DailyMed.

Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Amivantamab-vmjw is approved to treat adults with:

ItemizedList.ListItem: non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) that has an abnormal EGFR gene and has spread. It is used:with lazertinib mesylate hydrate as the first treatment with carboplatin and pemetrexed disodium or in patients whose cancer got worse during or after treatment with an EGFR tyrosine kinase inhibitorwith carboplatin and pemetrexed disodium as the first treatmentalone in patients whose cancer got worse during or after platinum-based chemotherapy

Section.Para: Amivantamab-vmjw is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.

Section.Para: Drugs are often studied to find out if they can help treat or prevent conditions other than the ones they are approved for. This patient information sheet applies only to approved uses of the drug. However, much of the information may also apply to unapproved uses that are being studied.

Section.Title: Clinical Trials Accepting Patients
Section.Para: Find Clinical Trials for Amivantamab-vmjw - Check for trials from NCI's list of cancer clinical trials now accepting patients.

DrugInfoDisclaimer.Para: Important: The drug information on this page is meant to be educational. It is not a substitute for medical advice. The information may not cover all possible uses, actions, interactions, or side effects of this drug, or precautions to be taken while using it. Please see your health care professional for more information about your specific medical condition and the use of this drug.
